duties_responsibilities.duty: Physically transport products throughout the country while complying with all state and federal laws and regulations.
Deliver products for customers with a safety-first mindset and provide exceptional customer service.
Operate in compliance with FMCSA regulations and maintain pre-scheduled appointments.
Complete thorough vehicle safety inspections and E-DVIR for mechanical conditions in need of repair.
Maintain a clean and professional image as a representative of the company.
Drive 2019 or newer tractors and late model Great Dane refer trailers.

education_certification.credential: 100,000 miles driving experience or completion of a certified truck driving school
